body: We've actually got rid of of `cadd` methods. Both tensor-scalar and tensor-tensor ops are now called `add`.
body_html: We've actually got rid of of cadd methods. Both tensor-scalar and tensor-tensor ops are now called add.
body_text: We've actually got rid of of cadd methods. Both tensor-scalar and tensor-tensor ops are now called add.
